name: Pedal-Olli 3D
description:
Pedal-Olli 3D
Experience the new extreme sports trend in 3D

When every other extreme sport is not extreme enough.
This is the true hardcore experience, starring Olli the pedal-hipster. Perform tricks and beat challenges to become the world's best bedalo performer.
Select from different characters and discover Locations all around the world and beyond.

How much property demage can you cause?

Can you make it across the highway?

Will you smoke the Alien Crystals?

Are you ready for a real trip?

The only way to find out is to get on your pedals and keep rollin' rollin' rollin'.

Features:

  • - 3 detailled Levels
  • - challenge mode
  • -4 different characters
  • - 25 song soundtrack with EDM, Punk, Rock and Hip-Hop music


Including the authentic soundtrack.
